headers.subject: [osol-code] StarFish Project

headers.received: by mail.opensolaris.org (Postfix, from userid 505) id 4E4AE1C60E4; Sat, 2 Jan 2010 04:33:29 -0800 (PST)

body.para:
I do not know whether this is the correct group to post that the download links
of the StarFish Project are somehow not working. However I have managed it to
download the files via rewriting the url. As a new OpenSolaris user I'm very
impressed how easy it is with this great Project to study now the codebase as
it's no fun do it via vi :-).
